OboeFreeList
interface
OboeFreeList

Scheduler uses the interface to allocate an entry for register renaming or commit and free and entry when instruction retired.

Method
allocate
method ActionValue#(
Tag
) allocate()

Allocate an entry from the ROB or physical register file.

Return: Tag to the allocated entry.

commitAndFree
method ActionValue#(
Tag
) commitAndFree(Tag commit_ptr, Tag to_free)

Commit an entry and free an entry simultaneously.

Parameter
commit_ptr

Tag to the entry to commit.

to_free

Tag to the entry to be freed.

Return: Tag of the entry to commit next.
